name: @ebay/skin
description: Skin - CSS modules that represent the brand eBay

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run lint:js && npm run build:icons && npm run copy && tsx scripts gen-build
scripts.build:css: npm run lint:sass && rimraf dist && npm run bundle && npm run postcss && tsx scripts/add-y-comments && prettier dist --write && npm run lint:css
scripts.copy: npm run copy:sassToDist && npm run copy:svgToDist && npm run copy:svgToDocs && npm run copy:assetsToStorybook
scripts.copy:sassToDist: copyfiles src/sass/variables dist -u 2 && copyfiles src/sass/mixins/public dist/mixins -u 4 && copyfiles src/sass/gh dist -u 2
scripts.copy:svgToDocs: copyfiles src/svg src/routes/static -u 2 && copyfiles src/svg/icons.svg src/components/master-icons.marko -f
scripts.deploy: BASE_URL=/evo-web/skin/ marko-run build -o ./_site && npm run build:storybook && rimraf _site/public/archive && copyfiles docs/archive _site/public -u 1 && touch _site/public/.nojekyll
scripts.deploy:only: marko-run build -o ./_site && npm run build:storybook && rimraf _site/public/archive && copyfiles docs/archive _site/public -u 1 && touch _site/public/.nojekyll
scripts.lint: npm run lint:sass && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.snapshots: npm run build:snapshots && npx gulp runSnapshots --stories $STORIES
scripts.snapshots:dry: npm run build:snapshots && npx gulp runSnapshots --dry yes --stories $STORIES
